patterns: What kinds of services are there?
responses: We have various services, including mental health well being and enchancing development skills.
Check out our services, by clicking on the tab given in the top bar :)
We are a one stop hub for healing coding depression, check out our services!
Our entire range of services are free of cost.
We accept only gratitude! Rest everything is free of cost at CodeRX

patterns: How do I improve myself at coding?
I am feeling low, when it comes to coding?
responses: Contact any of the medical professionals by going to the 'Get Help' tab.
We have a range of services to improve your coding skills and mental health. Don't worry everything will be fine!
